clir.model

Class ResultsList

  • java.lang.Object
    • clir.model.ResultsList

  • public class ResultsList
extends Object
    The Class ResultsList consisting of a List of PaperHits next to the queryTerms used for producing them, and a flag indicating if they come from LSI or automatic query translation. Further information could be included here.
    Author:
    Gabriel
